website_summaries.verdict: Clever fermentation features at a great price.
pros: This kit boasts 6 waterless airlock lids with built-in month and day trackers as well as easy-release tabs for simple installation
The included oxygen extractor pump helps you reduce the risk of mold and other contaminants at the later stages of fermenting
Pump can also be used to preserve the life of other foods in the pantry
cons: Does not include glass weights or a wood tamper

customer_reviews.title: Great Product & Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these lids! I use them for pickling and they are great After losing 4 of the center rubber pieces when washing them (don't ask), I sent the company an email asking how I could purchase more. They replied within one hour (in the middle of the night) asking me how many I needed and what address to send them to. That is great customer service! I look forward to learning more about fermenting and the information included with the lids gives great recommendations.
customer_reviews.author: Eorakamen

customer_reviews.title: Go with these for your fermenting needs.
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service, great product, already fermenting away. You can pay twice as much for something similar but there is no need to as these work perfectly fine and for a much better price. Already placed second order.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Aaron

customer_reviews.title: These work great. I am glad I bought them
customer_reviews.text: These work great. I am glad I bought them. I make sauerkraut, pickles, and kvass and I think these will work great for all of them. The only thing I have made with them so far is the kvass and they were wonderful. So easy to use. No filling little air locks with water or any of that. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product, It shipped promptly with great instructions and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, It shipped promptly with great instructions and recipes. I like that the lids can be used on mason jars to make multiple recipes once a batch is finished.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Hein

customer_reviews.title: Highly Reccomended
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased as a gift and was greatly appreciated by the recipient. She researched various fermenting systems and recognized this as one of the best!
customer_reviews.author: D. Cheatham

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am happy that I bought two sets when it was on sale and paid $30 for 6 lids. Very high quality and now I can put away my traditional 3-piece airlocks. I would buy another two sets if the sale was still on! Follow up: I have been using them for several months now and really enjoyed them. Compared to competitors’ products I have also bought since then, I like these better. Therefore, I have bought the 6-pack recently, which brought the unit price from being good to great!
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Lids For Sauerkraut
customer_reviews.text: We are just getting starting with fermentation/canning and decided to start with sauerkraut. These lids are very well made, very easy to use with our wide mouth mason jars and we just love the ability to have the date on each jar. Being able to remove the air from each jar when we're sealing them, almost makes the fermentation process for us error free. These lids will definitely save you time, effort and stress.
customer_reviews.author: Demiku

customer_reviews.title: Works well but clings to odors
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to fermenting and these lids have helped me make multiple great ferments without worrying about burping my jars daily and with no mold growth. The big issue I've found is that they cling to the odor of your ferment and tend to smell pretty strongly regardless of how much you clean them after their first use. I'm also a little unhappy with the durability of the date tracking rings as I've already had one ring pop off while soaking my lids in hot water trying to combat the aforementioned smell. These lids are nice and useful but not perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Design
customer_reviews.text: I'm used to putting my ferments in a pantry and checking occasionally. Twice now my ferment liquid has EVAPORATED, despite being tightly sealed. The vacuum valve is anything but. Super upset I spent money on this junk.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Byrd

customer_reviews.title: they leak. not sure if they work yet
customer_reviews.text: i used their recipes for pickles. and kraut. the lids leak from the top - liquid. maybe they are supposed to bubble out? i pump-out air on all three jars over the last 6 days. the pickles were salty enough to be inedible after 5 days so the recipe ain’t great. but i’m still working with them. not giving up yet.
customer_reviews.author: ChristopherJ

customer_reviews.title: Did not get reliable locks
customer_reviews.text: I could not get successful fermentations using these lids. I could never tell if i had good airlock. I often pulled fluid up through the lid. Every time I used the lid I had mold within days. The paperwork offered no cleaning care instructions. Is it dishwasher safe, should I boil it, can I spray with bleach to kill mold?? The dial feature to note the date is a great idea but difficult for old eyes to read, one lid's dial was impossible to turn. I have had much better results with water in a ziplock bag submerged in the brine and a piece of tape with the date written on it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: great fermenting tool
customer_reviews.text: It seems no matter how many jars of veggies I ferment, one jar in the batch always seems to mold--UNTIL NOW! Every jar was perfect after 21 days. I like having the date on the lid, and the pump to draw out excess air is the best idea yet. Also easier to clean than the air lock lids. I couldn't be happier with this set. I definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: JodiODO

customer_reviews.title: Impressive product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great little system, was looking for an off gassing Mason jar system for fermenting and so far this is the best I've tried. Other water lock systems have gotten nasty and uncleanable, and I've had the silicone nipple lids that get suctioned back into the jar, coming unseated and letting air in for sure. This appears to have good structure and seal. I'm sure I'll be back for more later in the garden season.
customer_reviews.author: BRAINY33

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I previously bought a similar set from a ...
customer_reviews.text: These have worked great for me. I had previously bought similar lids by Nourished Essentials, I find these to be of superior quality. I would buy these again and would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Hotbones

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this product once, so far it's worked as stated. Well made and fits every wide mouth jar I have no matter size or shape. Makes fermenting small batches simple and pickling eggs very quick.
customer_reviews.author: S. Pedersen

customer_reviews.title: These work really great. This is our second set of MassonLock lids ...
customer_reviews.text: These work really great. This is our second set of MassonLock lids and we will probably order a third set. We are very happy with the product and it's quality. Sam & Edie Mori
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: Date arrows and ring not of quality.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this product except one thing. On my very first use 2 out of the 3 lids I used the date arrows and date ring came off. Not happy with that part of the lids.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gantz

customer_reviews.title: Easiest
customer_reviews.text: This has to be my favorite way to ferment! Super easy and no more writing down when you did something. May I suggest or beg for you to put up a video on sealing the canning lids on with the pump. I just couldn't quite get it. Thanks, love the product and plan on buying more lids from you.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Hilliard

customer_reviews.title: Tops work great!
customer_reviews.text: I made my first jar of sauerkraut and it worked just fine. Literally my first jar ever. Top was a little hard too get off as the instructions said would likely be the case. I had to put the jar in between my legs and open it. Top came off fairly easy that way. Careful not to spill if you try taking it off that way.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: I've had great success with these lids and they're so easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: "I'm fairly new to the fermenting scene and have tried a few recipes with regular lids but ended up with a mess and inedible ferments, which I'm sure is due to my own ineptitude. However, I've had great success with these lids and they're so easy to use. Gave me the confidence that, yes I can make my own ferments and eat them too!"
customer_reviews.author: RebY

customer_reviews.title: I loved them so much, i bought more
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set I have purchased. They are easy to use to make ferments in jars, and clean up easy. They have little black markers and a calendar to indicate when you made it. Combined with fermenting weights, I have been able to ferment green beans, pea pods, carrots, garlic, sauerkraut, and asparagus (so far!). I love them.
customer_reviews.author: T, Cooker

customer_reviews.title: Great quality lids
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality ferminting lids with a pump. This is my first time fermenting vegetables, so I am learning. But these appear to be a good quality and much better price than other similar lids.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter-in-law got these for her birthday and she said she really likes them.
customer_reviews.author: pamela brule

customer_reviews.title: They do a great job.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried all kinds of fermenting jars and containers, you name it, to make sauer kraut and the results vary. These fermenting lids, however, are able to product a pretty consistent result and I do not experience the weird -going-bad sauerkrauts any more. Very happy about these jars. I will consider getting more of them next time/
customer_reviews.author: connie nelson

customer_reviews.title: Love this kit!
customer_reviews.text: If you want to make ferments THIS is what you need! The lids make it so easy to make ferments without having to check to release pressure. These lids fit on so many jars. We love these lids!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: I figured out that the suction pump for this product works perfectly with FoodSaver zipper vacuum bags. I did a test a week ago using a damp paper towel. I used the hand suction pump for this item, sucked all the air out. A week later it still has a strong vacuum seal. As far as the jar tops that came with this order half of them won't hold a vacuum overnight. I only use 2 or 3 at a time so it's not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very handy and makes fermenting easier.
customer_reviews.text: I like being able to pump the air out. I like being able to have the date right on top. I like that I can release the pressure when I'm ready to open the jar.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Great jars
customer_reviews.text: These are great jars for storing foods, liquids and anything you want. The tops screw on easily with a snug fit and they can be placed in refrigerator or cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine

customer_reviews.title: Finally In The Know!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I stumbled upon these while looking for ways of making homemade sauerkraut. I've always used a 5 gallon bucket not knowing that this "countertop size" was out there. I made my first batch of sauerkraut and it turned out amazing. It's super easy. The smaller batch is perfect. I love that I can watch it through a glass jar. Don't be afraid to try this if you've ever thought of making your own fermented foods.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: new to me
customer_reviews.text: instructions could be a little plainer - I got a few that the holes in the top didn't open - I ruined one before I figured out how it needed to be cut - easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: These are a quality construction, with a caveat
customer_reviews.text: These are a quality construction, with a caveat the seal around the rubber pump point when clean/dry leaks: so I use a light coating of veggie oil on the bottom of the rubber seal to the lid. This also makes the the rubber pump seal easier to reinsert after cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Halle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work great but be sure not to screw them on too tight or they'll get stuck!
customer_reviews.author: Tiny Tardis

customer_reviews.title: Takes the guesswork and stress out of kitchen ferments
customer_reviews.text: These lids take the guess work and the complexity out of kitchen fermenting. I’ve made several batches of pickles and sauerkraut and one batch of asparagus with these. I LOVE the date counter on the top to tell you when your ferment started (most useful for sauerkraut that takes a long time!). They are also easy to clean. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T. A. Grace

customer_reviews.title: Game changer for home fermentation.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for making kimchi. No more need for “burping” your jars, releasing that ungodly stink into your home. I left a batch on ferment for almost two weeks and had no contamination or spoilage. I’m a fan.
customer_reviews.author: DoubleG

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't let gas escape as it should. Liquid leaks from the top sealing gasket. Don't over tighten or you'll never get it off. Should have a pressure release button to make it easier to loosen.
customer_reviews.author: Roscoe

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the fermentation process!
customer_reviews.text: These work great at helping the fermentation process succeed! Highly recommend them to anyone wanting to try out the fermentation process! Very well made product from the USA!
customer_reviews.author: mntngal100

customer_reviews.title: Good value and outstanding customer service.
customer_reviews.text: This package is a very good value compared to similar competitive products. And Eden Farmhouse Essentials has outstanding customer service. The pump that initially came with my purchase didn't work as effectively as it should have. I contacted Eden Customer Support directly. They promptly helped me diagnose my problem and quickly sent a replacement pump at no cost. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Harry Varnis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Trouble free, quality fermenting lids. Made a batch of kimchi, it is delicious. Have a batch of sauerkraut still fermenting. Peppers are next.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: It just doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I wish I tried using it earlier enough to figure it out to return it. It pumps air out but leaks and therefore doesn't provide any protection towards the top going bad. You have to do the same things you'd do with a regular jar lid. So in the end they are just very expensive lids.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS NOT A "KIT" !
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE ! NO JAR ! It is in itty bitty print in one of the pictures ! We were expecting a jar . We only needed 1 lid and 1 jar . Got 3 lids instead and no jar .
customer_reviews.author: John J.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: The product is well made. I find at time the pressure causes the food to press against the lid clogging the vent. Although I have only had this happen with kefir. They can be difficult to get off the jars from the pressure. But defently worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Red841

customer_reviews.title: Great product; great price
customer_reviews.text: An easy and inexpensive solution for home fermenting. Love having the ability to set a start or end date on the lid. Plus, the included vacuum pump is very handy. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: S. Citron

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: I love these fermentation lids. They're easy to clean and I like the date selection idea!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: Ordered dark grey got the white, other then that they worked well and happy overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easier to open than some other lids.
customer_reviews.text: Two little tabs work better than the lids with one little tab.
customer_reviews.author: T-roy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I needed and it works great! Got to my doorstep really fast too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I finally got around to using my fermenting lids. I made pickles and kimchi. Both turned out great. The lids are easy to use. I am very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product with a great seller
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. These lids came in a timely manner and have basic instructions that are easy to follow included. Seller seems very interested in my success and willing to help with any questions
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Made sauerkraut and it was so easy with these lids. Would recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: They've been great! For those who are thinking about buying, there is a rubber ring that you put INSIDE the too before you screw it in. DONT forget that or you'll have a heck of a time getting the too back off. Also it came with three and I didn't realize it.
customer_reviews.author: MaxieJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy sour sauerkraut
customer_reviews.text: This work just as advertised. Easy and does just enough for two people.
customer_reviews.author: Mycobra

customer_reviews.title: for fermenting and dry storage
customer_reviews.text: love these I have many that I use for dry storage and fermenting
customer_reviews.author: ScaryHairLady

customer_reviews.title: I dont recommend for saurkraut but great for other ferments
customer_reviews.text: Work properly but for saurkraut in a full Mason jar you lose about 90% of the liquid , very dry saurkraut 😢
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Far so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one to replace one where the internal seal failed. So far no problems.
customer_reviews.author: dwhitman

customer_reviews.title: Makes fermenting so much easier!
customer_reviews.text: Just simply do not ferment without these... I don't know why I waited so long!! They are just wonderful!

customer_reviews.title: ... seem to work very well and making fermenting very easy. Thank you
customer_reviews.text: They seem to work very well and making fermenting very easy. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Pappy

customer_reviews.title: Love these lids
customer_reviews.text: Love these lids, I am new to fermenting and they are making it easy for me. I had a small problem which was immediately and professionally addressed to my complete satisfaction. Thank you Eden Farmhouse. DonnaLea
customer_reviews.author: natures doorstep

customer_reviews.title: Like a water bed for fermenting  peppers
customer_reviews.text: My son makes homemade hot sauce and these jars with lids make the fermenting process much easier than in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Eggleston

customer_reviews.title: Tight Lids for Fermentation
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent fermentation lids and fit nicely. It is very easy to lock in place.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Great lids for ferments
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of these lids. They work great!! No more burping ferments!
customer_reviews.author: Kathi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Kit looks great and I'm waiting for the Jars and Mini Farming Guide to start Fermenting.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Wohlenhaus Munday

customer_reviews.title: Amazing device makes fermentation easy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing device makes fermentation easy. Have already made two bottles of delicious dill pickles and a bottle of hot giardenaria, and it only took five days!
customer_reviews.author: Wiseman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fermenting set up!
customer_reviews.text: I made some of the best sauerkraut I have ever tasted in about 9 days!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks very well built. Looking forward to using it this summer. Very happy with the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Randy Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Date tracker pieces will fly out upon opening the package. And you will never get them to stay put.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I removed these lids from the package I realized that the main rim that holds the very tiny, black "date trackers" was loose. I tried with every ounce of my patience to "snap" the rim back into place to no avail. One of the main selling points was now inoperable. They will still do the job, but I will have to rely on a piece of tape on the side of my jar to let me know the start and end times of my ferments, something I was hoping to avoid. I would recommend buying the more expensive, yet reliable option from another seller.
customer_reviews.author: vils

customer_reviews.title: Love these airlock lids
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase. I love that the lid has both month and day markers. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Karen L

customer_reviews.title: This lids make fermenting easy.
customer_reviews.text: Used them a few times and we are enjoying the fermented vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen VanHorn

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about these lids
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about these lids. They're beautiful, easy to use and I can't wait to try my finished product!
customer_reviews.author: Eva J

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Regret buying it, not as described on the website. Not easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Lascano

customer_reviews.title: do not buy this crap!
customer_reviews.text: Too hard to open it, do not buy this crap!
customer_reviews.author: Que Y.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly, put my pineapples ginger cinnamon and sugar ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, put my pineapples ginger cinnamon and sugar in a jar and 4 days later I got tepache. If you have ever made tepache then you would know how carbonated it gets, and I can hear the co2 leaking from the top when I'm in the living room. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Troy Boone

customer_reviews.title: which turned out wonderfully. The only drawback is it can be almost ...
customer_reviews.text: They work well! I have made a couple batches of sriracha and some fermented apples, which turned out wonderfully. The only drawback is it can be almost impossible to get the lids off once you have fermented with them.
customer_reviews.author: MARTY

customer_reviews.title: Very simple to use and so far so good for me
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to ise and so far so good for me. I have made several batches of saurkraut where as before the top at least would get moldy, but not with this. It takes the guess work out of fermenting foods since you are removing all the oxygen.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: My peppers are doing great. The lids work perfectly keeping the oxygen out ...
customer_reviews.text: When I got my order I noticed the pump was missing. I contacted the seller. She replied, literally, less than 10 minutes and sent me the pump along with another fermenting lid for free. My peppers are doing great. The lids work perfectly keeping the oxygen out and I couldn't recommend them highly enough!
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Work wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: I love these fermenting lids. They pressurize easily with the pump. When my ferments are in the initial stages of fermenting (the first few days to about a week), they make lots of bubbles and cause the rubber button to depressurize, but all you have to do is pump it back down. There's nothing wrong with this - it just means your stuff is fermenting and releasing CO2. Once your ferments aren't producing so much gas, it is easier to keep the jars pressurized.
customer_reviews.author: Hummingbird

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these for a good while now. Try them. You won’t be disappointed. My tips: if you tend to shake your jars occasionally then remove the lid afterwards n clean it up. It gets bits on the center seal and won’t hold a vacuum. Not a defect. Just something you gotta do to keep it clean. Also not cleaning it will get it gummed up n potentially stick shut making the lid hard to remove. Again. Keep it clean and no problems. Much better than metal lids that rust. Lastly. The company’s service is first class. You email them, they address it immediately. Buy their lid remover tool to make life easier.
customer_reviews.author: Hambone

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Nice solution to any issues with mold. Add the glass inserts to keep the ferment under the liquid and you have a great combination.
customer_reviews.author: Girma - Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for making sauerkraut
customer_reviews.text: I thought of making sauerkraut from scratch. I did not try the recipe from online, because the product comes with some recipes, including sauerkraut. Well, you need a magnifier to read the tiny print of the recipe. I guess they are printed so tiny to reduce costs. So I bought red cabbage and followed the recipe. The kit does not have weights. I have to buy them separately (weights are needed to keep the cabbage under the liquid). Wow, the sauerkraut turned very good and far superior than store-bought one. The taste is far complex. Thanks for making great products.
customer_reviews.author: Pikmin

customer_reviews.title: I like the ability to set the date on the lid.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived promptly and in perfect condition. Put them into use immediately as I've had an abundance of sweet baby bell and peperoncino this spring. Only improvement I can immediately see is if the date tab would lock in place. It's moved twice when I wiped off the lid and had to be reset. Update: I have an additional recommendation that you also sell just the lids without the pump and extra cost. I just purchased the 3 lid + pump combo and would consider 3 or maybe more just the lids, but I'm trying to cost of purchase down.
customer_reviews.author: P. Warren

customer_reviews.title: Good Concept! Works Better than anticipated!
customer_reviews.text: The material the lids are made of is really good. The little pump air extractor is a tad stupid to use as it doesn't suck out as much air as I'd think it should per pump so several pumps are required to do the job properly. Once pressure builds up it will come out on its own but the air extractor will pull bubbles up from the bottom without having to shake or tap the jar. The calendar on the lid is very handy when timing the fermentation time. The threads fits my jars and are NOT prone to cross threading which is GOOD and much better than regular metal jar lids.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Sink

customer_reviews.title: Simply awesome and easy way to make kraut.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product, amazing customer service. Would not hesitate to order again. Just finished eating some of my first batch of sauerkraut....awesome! Thanks for a great product, and the best customer service.
customer_reviews.author: matt shimmel

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Adding fermented foods to my diet has ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Adding fermented foods to my diet has really improved my health! This product makes it so easy!
customer_reviews.author: Robert R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fermenting Lids! SO EASY!
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazing! Easy to use, come in a great storage box and have wonderful instructions. I bought these to make Keifer Water and they do their job perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Erin WTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my first set of six and have made fermented salsa, pickles and kraut. These are so easy to use, I love the shorter profile, the jars tuck away easier than my older fermenting kits with the tall attachments. I usually pump 7-8 times pulling the air out. I've had no mold issues and I do like the date tracking feature on top. I ended up ordering a second set for myself and a set for my parents who also enjoy fermenting!
customer_reviews.author: rutabagapie

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fermented my peppers for hot sauce and it turned out amazing. The pump to purge any left over O2 is handy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris P

customer_reviews.title: My Airlock of Choice Going Forward
customer_reviews.text: I started getting into making fermented pepper sauce last year and have tried multiple airlocks. These are the best. They do not leak and the pump allows me to create a vacuum and get out the oxygen. I have done multiple batches and have not lost one to spoilage yet.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chomer

customer_reviews.title: GUARANTEED SUCCESS!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely impressed with this product but even more impressed with the support offered by the seller. I was expecting to receive the lids I ordered, but was so pleasantly surprised to also receive a sauerkraut recipe and seller contact offering. The MasonLock lids are well worth the price and with the seller's support you are going to love your fermentation experience.
customer_reviews.author: B. Gilroy

customer_reviews.title: A must have item!
customer_reviews.text: Great product that is easy to use. Highly reccomend if you do any type of fermenting.
customer_reviews.author: Chewie

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels right
customer_reviews.text: After some missteps I landed on this one. Looks and feels right. Being able to set the month as well as the day is an improvement over ( some of ) the others. Look forward to fermenting with this kit. If anything untoward comes up I'll revise this review.
customer_reviews.author: Valdimar Jonsson

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use!! Get some wide mouth jars, glass weights (to keep food submerged), clean all properly prior to use and you are ready to start lacto fermentation!!!! The date setting lid just makes the entire process easier!!!! Healthy Fun!!
customer_reviews.author: DiggsLife

customer_reviews.title: Make your own
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids are loving it and are currently making sauerkraut and kimchi.
customer_reviews.author: DIYer

customer_reviews.title: These lids are so handy... no mess ...
customer_reviews.text: These lids are so handy... no mess etc. lot easier then my old fashion way of stomping.. still stomp 80# a year.
customer_reviews.author: carvinmom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it now and has worked fine. It's to early to report on the full results.
customer_reviews.author: rjmyhresr

customer_reviews.title: Great for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: I've used a lot of methods to ferment. This device works well most of the time, but seems to be occasionally prone to airlock failures that are difficult to detect until it is too late. There is a chance each occurrence was related to error, but I've never failed in this manner with other fermentation methods. Overall, I would definitely recommend this product over most other fermentation kits to beginners. It is great for short fermentations and is extremely easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: asdf;lkhapksdlfhj;lsa

customer_reviews.title: Lids won't open easily
customer_reviews.text: I really like the ease of use and dating the jar, but getting the lid off is a challenge. My reason for the less one Star. I did the escape the air, did not work. I finally tried some hot water under the faucet, that did the job. I likely will continue to use them, but will not tighten them as much. If you have arthritic fingers/hand, I would recommend another option.
customer_reviews.author: tk

customer_reviews.title: Works great for fermenting vegetables 🥒🍆🥕🥦
customer_reviews.text: They work great on mason jars to ferment veggies, but don't boil them to sterilize them because the plastic gets deformed/ruined and then it does not fit on the jar. I boiled one for 10 minutes to sterilize it and ruined it. To clean them, water and soap will do.
customer_reviews.author: cucuyo

customer_reviews.title: Great Lids!
customer_reviews.text: I just prepared my first fermentation recipe, Hot Pink Jalapeño Garlic Kraut using these lids. The instructions that came with the lids were great, super easy to use for someone new to fermentation like myself. I still have a lot to learn but these will make the whole process much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Crosier

customer_reviews.title: Nice Features
customer_reviews.text: "Really like these so far, nice to have both the month and day on the lid!"
customer_reviews.author: jungleclipper

customer_reviews.title: ... to my mom for Christmas and she is very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to my mom for Christmas and she is very happy with them.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: liked knowing that I had an anaerobic environment while I learned to ferment vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: D.

product_meta.title: Save Time with the Easy Wide-Mouth Fermenting Kit. Accurately Tracks Start Time 6 Waterless Airlock Fermenter Lids, Pump, User Guide. Ferment Sauerkraut, Pickles and More Fermented Probiotics. No Mold
product_meta.description:
Color:Farmhouse White| Size:6 Pack + PumpEASILY FERMENT FOODS AT HOME FOR A HEALTHY PROBIOTIC RICH DIET IN ANY WIDE MOUTH MASON JAR. The ONLY airlock lid that offers both two handles for easier removal as well as both Day and Month time tracking options. The Lid makes fermenting simple because it requires no burping or water locks. Beautifully designed to look great in any kitchen. Meticulously designed, making sure to offer you all the best features and quality at a great price. Easily add shelf life to dry and wet goods stored in the fridge or pantry. Fermented vegetables may ease symptoms of brain fog, mental illness, digestive problems, leaky gut syndrome, IBS, mood disorder, depression, anxiety, asthma, allergies, hormonal sensitivities, candida, diabetes, obesity, weight gain, and more! Fermenting foods creates an environment for billions of good bacteria probiotics to grow and are a healthy addition to many lifestyles such as the Ketogenic/Ketosis, Paleo, Mediterranean, Gaps, Raw or Clean 30 diets or just plain cleaner eating, green living, and spreading the wellness movement! Hand wash in warm soapy water. Re-use again and again! 
Preserve Sauces and other types of food by preventing mold! Store fresh juice and keep it fresh longer by preventing oxidation. Marinate meats more effectively. Make yogurt and preserve it in refrigerator for months.
feature_bullets: INCLUDES 6 Gorgeous BPA-FREE Masonlock Fermenting Lids, Oxygen Extractor Pump, 2 Extra Silicone Seals, Recipe & Guide (JAR NOT INCLUDED). Lids fit right onto a wide-mouth mason jar perfectly. Designed in the USA with your health in mind by using high quality food-grade material! We offer a 100% GUARANTEE if you are dissatisfied for any reason! Beautiful white clean farmhouse design will look fantastic in your kitchen and get all your friends asking what you're doing!

MONTH & DAY TRACKER-Why pay more?! The ONLY fermenting lid set that offers more for your money with a tracker that keeps the Day AND Month! Our unique date setting tool makes tracking your time easy. You can know EXACTLY when your ferment started, when it's complete, and how long it’s been stored--for incredible tasting batches every time!

MOLD & MESS FREE-Our FAIL-PROOF Masonlock airlock technology lets carbon dioxide gas (CO2) escape without allowing oxygen (O2) in-NO MORE MOLD! No need to fill water or burp lids-NO MORE MESS with crocks or clunky 3-piece things that don’t fit anywhere!

2 EASY RELEASE TABS-The ONLY fermentation lid with TWO tabs for EASIER twisting on and off! Simply pull the center seal slightly to the side to release pressure, then unscrew the fermenter lid frustration-free for easy access to the millions of probiotics you just made! Makes a great bundle gift for adults, women and men who want to provide natural, safe immune support for themselves, baby, toddlers, children, kids and teens.

MULTI-PURPOSE-Beginners can EASILY make sauerkraut, pickles, miso, tempeh, natto, kimchi and so many more live culture ferments! But our lid can ALSO be used to preserve and extend the shelf life of wet and dry goods in the fridge or pantry! Just pump a few times for an airtight vacuum seal that lasts for weeks for all your seeds, nuts, flour, coconut, coffee beans, and grains!
